trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> object that is specified by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Parameters" name="Parameters" href=""></xref> properties of the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的组件编辑器<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>由指定的对象<xref uid="langword_csharp_Parameters" name="Parameters" href=""></xref>属性关联的数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: The ParameterCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> object at design time, as specified by one of the `Parameters` properties.
trans-unit.target: ParameterCollectionEditor 类提供一个用户界面以进行编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>在设计时，所指定的对象`Parameters`属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The `Parameters` properties include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, and other data source controls.
trans-unit.target: `Parameters`属性包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>，和其他数据源控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ParameterCollectionEditor is invoked by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on one of the `Parameters` properties in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: ParameterCollectionEditor 调用通过选择省略号 (**...**) 之一上的按钮`Parameters`中的属性**属性**的可视化设计器的网格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method edits the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> for the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A>方法编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>为关联的数据源控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>方法获取与此编辑器相关联的编辑样式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor> class when the page designer selects the ellipsis (**…**) button on one of the `Parameters` properties in the visual designer's **Properties** grid while designing the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: 当页设计器中选择省略号时，.NET Framework 构造<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>类的新实例 (**...**) 之一上的按钮`Parameters`中可视化设计器的属性**属性**时设计关联的数据源控件的网格。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: Edits the elements of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> objects of the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: 编辑的元素<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>对象相关联的数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: The EditValue method extracts the associated data source control and the data source control designer that is associated with that control from the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: EditValue 方法中提取相关的数据源控件和数据源控件设计器都从该控件关联`context`参数。

trans-unit.source: The supported data source controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> controls, with their corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner> designers.
trans-unit.target: 支持的数据源控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件，其相对应的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>设计器。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Once the data is extracted, the EditValue calls back to the data source control designer to display an editing dialog box that is used to edit a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> object that is referenced by one of the `Parameters` properties of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 一旦提取的数据，EditValue 回拨到数据源控件设计器以显示用于编辑编辑对话框<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>由之一引用的对象`Parameters`属性的数据源控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used to acquire context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>用于获取上下文信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.IServiceProvider> through which editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，实现<xref:System.IServiceProvider>通过它可以获得编辑服务。</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The object to edit the value for.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The new value; otherwise, if the value of the object has not changed, value unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 新 value ; 否则为如果未更改对象的值， value 不变。

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此编辑器相关联的编辑样式。

trans-unit.source: The GetEditStyle method always returns the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> value, which indicates that the user interface for the editor is a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: GetEditStyle 方法始终返回<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>值，该值指示编辑器的用户界面是模式对话框。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that indicates the context of the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>指示正在编辑的对象的上下文的对象。

trans-unit.source: The editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: 与此编辑器相关联的编辑样式。
